name: Roxy Raccoon's Mancala Madness
description:
When a Voodoo Priestess seeks vengeance upon the world, it is up to one Raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy in this revitalized take on the classic Board Game. Learn the basics & master the tactics as you defeat Nasty Nala and her minions and prove, once and for all, that you are the true Mancala champion!

Roxy Raccoon's Mancala Madness is the next adventure in the beloved Roxy franchise. Take on the mysterious Voodoo Priestess as you end her evil curse in this all new adventure! Master the game of Mancala as you train with your allies and put an end to Nala's nefarious ways!

Classic Mancala Gameplay with a unique Roxy charm.

Multiple Ways to Play: Story Mode, Vs. A.I., Local Multiplayer and Online!

Unlockable Game Boards, Maps, Stones, Characters & Cosmetics!

Rapid Ryan’s Arcade: Experience a collection of bonus games including Peg Solitaire, Carrot Sweeper & more!

Online Achievements will showcase your mastery to the world!

Learn with an in-game manual and practice against 3 levels of A.I.!
